2144.subject: WLC
2144.course_title_long: Language and Culture for Heritage Speakers
2144.descrlong: This course is for heritage speakers who have a moderate proficiency in their Heritage language, but have completed little or no formal study of that language. Conducted in English, the course emphasizes the linguistic and cultural aspects of language ability, and learning strategies; provides an introduction to linguistics, and second language acquisition; incorporates 21st Century Skills and National Standards; and encourages students to think about the social implications of language use.  (Credit/ No Credit Available)
